repnme.cdata!: Comoros - Development Bank of Comoros (DBC) Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would strengthen the newly
            created development bank by: (i) providing it with part of
            its resource requirements to finance projected lending to
            small- and medium-scale enterprises in the key sectors of
            the economy during the 1983-86 period; (ii) financing
            technical assistance to DBC for the management of the
            institution, project promotion and technical support to
            entrepreneurs as well as training of DBC's staff. The
            project would stimulate the development of productive
            sectors of the economy and foster institutional development
            of the new DFC bank.
